result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

records.addlTxt: Jury trial - 12 person on May 8, 2023 at 09:00 am.
Status conference on April 13, 2023 at 02:30 pm.
Status conference on November 11, 2022 at 09:00 am.

9:00 AM case called. Attorney Angela Lynn Beranek in court for State of Wisconsin. Defendant Adam N. Langiewicz in court, in custody with Attorney Ryan Joseph Raymond. Attorney Raymond states the matter has not been resolved, pleas will not be entered and requests it be set for trial. Defense mentions possible NGI plea in future, to be addressed further at next status conference. 

Victim G.S. makes statement.

Counsel to schedule Jury Trial (5 day) with Branch 2 Judicial Assistant.

Status Conference set for 11/11/2022 at 9:00 AM (1/2 hour).
Status conference on September 9, 2022 at 09:00 am.

2:27 PM Defendant Adam N. Langiewicz in court, in custody.  Attorney Ryan Joseph Raymond in court for Adam N. Langiewicz. Attorney Angela Lynn Beranek in court for State of Wisconsin. Defendant has completed a psychological evaluation, and the results were received this morning. Parties have not had time to review the report. Victim G.S., J.R. and K.M. appear and make statements to court. 
Status Conference: 09/09/22 at 9am in person.
Status conference on August 22, 2022 at 02:30 pm.

11:40 AM Defendant Adam N. Langiewicz in court, in custody.  Attorney Angela Lynn Beranek in court for State of Wisconsin. Attorney Alicia Linzmeier appeared for Attorney Ryan Joseph Raymond in court for Adam N. Langiewicz. Victim/Witness statute complied with. 

STC: 08/22/22 at 2:30pm
of J.R.
K.S.
M.M.
Status conference on June 9, 2022 at 01:30 pm.

Case called at 9:40 AM.
Defendant Adam N. Langiewicz appeared by video, in custody from the jail, Attorney Ryan Joseph Raymond for Adam N. Langiewicz appeared in court. Attorney Monica Fallon for State of Wisconsin appeared in court.  Defendant waives his right to personal appearance. 
Defendant waives reading of Information and enters Not Guilty pleas.  20 days granted for filing of motions. Defense requests a STC in June.
STC:  6/9/22 at 1:30 PM.
Same as Amended Complaint.
Arraignment on March 10, 2022 at 09:30 am.

Conditions:
No contact with victims J.S. & G.S. & residence or any of victim family members.
No acts or threats of violence against anyone.
Defendant to maintain absolute sobriety.
No use or possession of firearms.
Comply with Pre-Trial Monitoring Services.

(Case called at 9:32 AM- by Zoom) Prosecuting attorney Robert W. Stoiber appeared in court for the State of Wisconsin, Defendant Adam N. Langiewicz appeared by video, in custody, Attorney Alica Linzmeier for Attorney Ryan Joseph Raymond appeared in court for Adam N. Langiewicz. 
Defendant waives right to personal appearance. Defendant waives right to a preliminary hearing and Court accepts waiver. Arraignment to be scheduled with Branch 2 Judicial Assistant. 
State requests bond be amended regarding no contact initials. 
Court orders bond to be amended regarding initials of no contacts.
Notice of Assignment of Judge - Return to Sender, Not Deliverable as Addressed, Unable to Forward
